New Records: Harmeet Singh was named Player of the Match
The match was the first international fixture between the USA and Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Muztafizur Rahman took twin strikes in the 12th over
Harmeet Singh's cameo with three sixes and two fours
Significant partnership between Harmeet Singh and Corey Anderson
Early loss of USA's captain Monank Patel
Pre-Game Insights: USA skipper Monank Patel won the toss
Post-Match Reflections: Harmeet Singh's performance was praised as historic
The victory marked a significant milestone for USA cricket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Prairie View Cricket Complex
Others: The match was the first of a three-match series
USA's performance was noted as resilient
